scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w frontend" "npm run dev -w backend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w palette-types && npm run build -w backend
scripts.build:all: npm run build -w palette-types && npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run test -w frontend" "npm run test -w backend"
scripts.push:
npm run build:all && npm run prettier:check && npm run lint && npm run test && echo '

Looks great, ready to push!'
